last_retract_delay.description: Extra time deloy to play the retract functionality on the last retracting attachment.

disable_retract.description: [bool]Special case to disable the retract animations from playing on both sides of the rack.

map_name.description: [string]Localization tag for the map name of this hellpod rack

last_retract_ability.description: Ability to play when we are out of items.

random_payload_size.description: If we have a random payload size above 0, then we will attach random items from the payload settings. Override spawn_payload_size

spawn_payload_size.description: Indicates how many payloads should spawn from the settings list.

disable_initial_interaction.description: [bool]Should we prevent the initial interaction for the payload, meaning you have to destroy the rack in order to get them?
